title: League won't launch

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Since the client update. I get this error

https://imgur.com/a/1KGlm

I have tried reinstalling LoL. I've tried the suggestions of deleting certain folders. running as administrator, running the league repair kit. I'm open to more suggestions.

replies.body:
These Bad Image errors almost always point to some game files being incorrectly downloaded or installed. You should be able to fix that up pretty quickly by following the steps in the image I'm linking below!

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3kk4WfHf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-22T02:08:19.647+0000)
>
> These Bad Image errors almost always point to some game files being incorrectly downloaded or installed. You should be able to fix that up pretty quickly by following the steps in the image I'm linking below!
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png

Thanks so much! It worked!
